title: S3 Ep28: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 16 – Hypothetical Firebreaks
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 16 – Hypothetical Firebreaks
description:
November 12, 2018 / The jury at Dennis Perry's trial weighed the evidence, and found him guilty of murder. But... why? 

[Image: Satellite photo of Spring Bluff area from the 1980s, showing the possible firebreaks. Yellow is Firebreak #1; red is Firebreak #2.]

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by Blue Apron, Care Of, Boll and Branch, and Stamps.
